name: Hivello
description: Hivello is a DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) aggregator that enables users to earn by monetising idle computer resources across multiple decentralised networks, Hivello's mission is to radically simplify and open up DePIN mining to everyone. Hivello empowers users to access DePIN mining by aggregating DePIN networks into a simple node application. The HVLO token empowers Hivelloâ€™s ecosystem, enabling rewards, staking, and participation in DePIN networks.
